documentation.content: A container in the face-detection-app has restarted. Multiple restarts may indicate application instability or resource constraints. Check container logs and Kubernetes events for more information.

Container restart detected in the face-detection-app. This alert will notify:
- Email: lexuanhuy1234@gmail.com
- Slack: #devops-alerts
- Microsoft Teams: DevOps channel

Action items:
1. Check `kubectl describe pod` for termination reasons
2. Review container logs before restart occurred
3. Check for Out-of-Memory events or crashes

Frequent restarts may indicate application bugs or resource constraints.
